description: Riesling offers a touch of sweetness balanced by crisp acidity, enhancing the flavors of poutine while providing a refreshing contrast.
Sauvignon Blanc's vibrant acidity and citrus notes complement the freshness and spice of tacos, especially those with seafood or lighter meats.
food_pairing: Fish tacos, shrimp tacos, vegetarian tacos
appetizer_pairing: Guacamole with tortilla chips, Ceviche with tortilla chips

description: Chateau Ste. Michelle's Chardonnay offers ripe apple and pear flavors, accented by notes of vanilla and spice. It has a creamy texture and a lingering finish.
food_pairing: Grilled shrimp, roasted turkey, creamy pasta dishes, fried chicken

description: Gewürztraminer's aromatic profile, with notes of lychee, rose petal, and spice, complements the creamy and mildly spiced flavors of butter chicken.
food_pairing: Butter chicken, basmati rice, naan bread

description: Chenin Blanc's crisp acidity and fruity flavors, such as apple and pear, complement the spiced filling of samosas, creating a refreshing pairing.
La Crema's Pinot Gris is crisp and refreshing, with flavors of white peach, citrus, and honeydew melon. It has a lively acidity and a clean, zesty finish.
food_pairing: Lemon chicken, grilled vegetables, seafood linguine

description: Livio Felluga's Pinot Grigio is a crisp and elegant Italian white wine with delicate floral and citrus aromas. It offers flavors of green apple, pear, and mineral notes, with a refreshing acidity.
food_pairing: Seafood risotto, grilled vegetables, light salads
appetizer_pairing: Shrimp cocktail, bruschetta with tomatoes and basil

description: Gavi di Gavi is a crisp Italian white wine made from the Cortese grape. It features aromas of white flowers and stone fruits, with a zesty citrus flavor and a refreshing finish.
food_pairing: Grilled fish, seafood linguine, chicken piccata
appetizer_pairing: Antipasto platter with marinated vegetables and cured meats

description: Albariño's crisp acidity and flavors of citrus, green apple, and stone fruit complement the fresh and vibrant flavors of poke, enhancing each bite.
food_pairing: Ahi tuna poke, salmon poke, sushi rice bowls

description: Grüner Veltliner's zesty acidity, along with flavors of green apple, white pepper, and herbaceous notes, provides a refreshing contrast to the seafood and umami flavors of poke.
food_pairing: Salmon poke, octopus poke, seaweed salad
appetizer_pairing: Shrimp summer rolls with peanut dipping sauce

description: Montes Sauvignon Blanc is a refreshing Chilean white wine with aromas of citrus, green apple, and fresh herbs. It has crisp acidity and bright fruit flavors, perfect for warm weather enjoyment.
food_pairing: Ceviche, grilled fish tacos, goat cheese salad

description: Burrowing Owl Chardonnay is a premium Canadian white wine from British Columbia's Okanagan Valley. It exhibits aromas of ripe apple, pear, and citrus, with a creamy texture and well-integrated oak.
food_pairing: Grilled salmon, roasted chicken, creamy pasta dishes

description: Jackson-Triggs Riesling is a vibrant Canadian white wine with aromas of green apple, lime, and peach. It has a hint of sweetness balanced by crisp acidity, making it versatile and refreshing.
food_pairing: Spicy Thai dishes, grilled shrimp, fresh salads, sushi rolls with spicy mayo
appetizer_pairing: Fresh spring rolls with peanut dipping sauce, Pork dumplings with sweet chili sauce

description: Mission Estate Winery Gewürztraminer offers aromatic notes of lychee, rose petals, and exotic spices. It has a medium body, balanced acidity, and a hint of sweetness, making it a delightful pairing with sushi's diverse flavors.
food_pairing: Sushi rolls with spicy mayo, sashimi platter, vegetable tempura
appetizer_pairing: Edamame with sea salt, seaweed salad

description: Inniskillin's Pinot Gris exhibits ripe pear, apple, and citrus aromas with subtle floral undertones. It has a crisp acidity and a medium body, complementing the richness of cheese pasta dishes.
food_pairing: Creamy cheese pasta, spinach and ricotta ravioli, baked macaroni and cheese

description: Tinhorn Creek's Viognier offers enticing floral aromas, ripe peach, apricot, and honeyed notes. It has a medium to full body with a lush texture and balanced acidity, making it a wonderful accompaniment to roast turkey.
food_pairing: Roast turkey with sage stuffing, cranberry sauce, roasted root vegetables
appetizer_pairing: Butternut squash soup, pear and goat cheese salad

description: Vernaccia di San Gimignano is a crisp and dry white wine from Tuscany, Italy. It has refreshing acidity and flavors of citrus, green apple, and a hint of minerality, making it an excellent complement to creamy carbonara pasta.
food_pairing: Carbonara pasta, creamy risotto, seafood linguine

description: Soave Classico is a light-bodied Italian white wine from the Veneto region. It offers delicate floral aromas, crisp acidity, and flavors of pear, lemon, and almond, which pair beautifully with creamy chicken alfredo.
food_pairing: Chicken alfredo, grilled chicken, seafood pasta
appetizer_pairing: Caprese salad with fresh mozzarella and basil
